page.title: 07Brownies and Cubs
page.content: On Wednesdays I go Brownies, run by Brown Owl. Our uniform is a brown dress, belt and bobble hat and a yellow tie on which we wear our promise badge. We earn interest badges such as animal lover, hostess and pony-rider. We play games. Shadow is where everyone runs round and tries to keep on someone else's shadow. When Brown Owl shouts stop, if you are standing on someone's shadow you get a spill - a small piece of coloured wood. Cub scouting is on a Monday night. It is for boys aged 8 to ll years. We do a lot of good things like playing rounders. We have to turn to the flag when the flag is being raised. The colour of the uniform is green. We have a cap, scarf, and proficiency badges.
